00008 MathCursor::MathCursor(MMLDocument *o)
00009         : owner(o), cur(o), sel(o) {
00010         targetlevel = 0;
00011         x = y = 0;
00012         collaps = true;
00013         curmouse = true;
00014         start = &cur;
00015         end = &sel;
00016 }
00017 /* moving can also stop inside text elements e.g.
00018      <mfrac><mi>abcd<mglyph .../>efg</mi><mo>!</mo>
00019    this is not common, but it is possible. The cursur can be positioned
00020      <mfrac>^<mi>^a^b^c^d^<mglyph .../>^e^f^g^</mi>^<mo>^!^</mo>^</mfrac>
00021    because the texts are in a special text elements, denoted with square
00022    brackets:
00023      <mfrac><mi>[ab][cd]<mglyph .../>[efg]</mi><mo>[!]</mo>
00024    We allow the cursor at these positions:
00025      <mfrac>^<mi>*[^a^b*]*[^c^d*]^<mglyph .../>
00026      *[^e^f^g*]^</mi>^<mo>*[^!*]^</mo>^</mfrac>
00027    The stars give positions that are redundant.
00028    With two simple rules we can avoid the cursor visiting the redundant
00029    positions:
00030     - the cursor may never stop before a MMLText node
00031     - the cursor may never stop at the last position in a MMLText node
00032    By defining the rules in this way, we only need to check for the direct
00033    precence of a MMLText and avoid costly preemptive action such as checking
00034    all children of a node.
00035    Adhering to the second rule is easy: just check the value of offset.
00036    The first rule is a bit more difficult. It can be implemented recursively:
00037    when the result of 'moveNext' is a text node at ancetry[level+1], do one
00038    more step. */
00039 
00040 /*  move to the next sibling */
00041 MMLNode *
00042 MathCursor::moveNext() {
00043         do {
00044                 cur.moveNext();
00045 //      cout << "> " << cur.container()->nodeName() << ", " << cur.offset() << endl;
00046         } while (!cur.atEnd() && unwantedPos(cur));
00047         collapse();
00048         curmouse = false;
00049         return cur.container();
00050 }
00051 void
00052 MathCursor::selectNext() {
00053         if (collaps) {
00054                 sel.set(cur.container(), cur.offset());
00055         }
00056         do {
00057                 cur.moveNext();
00058 //      cout << "> " << cur.container()->nodeName() << ", " << cur.offset() << endl;
00059         } while (unwantedPos(cur));
00060         selmouse = curmouse;
00061         curmouse = false;
00062         initRange();
00063 }

00070         collapse();
00071         curmouse = false;
00072         return cur.container();
00073 }

00171 bool
00172 MathCursor::moveTo(float x, float y, BoundPoint &bp) const {
00173         MMLNode *n = owner->documentElement();
00174         MMLNode *c = n;
00175         // find the deepest node in which was clicked
00176         while (n) {
00177                 if (distToNode(x, y, n) == 0) {
00178                         c = n;
00179                         x -= c->getX();
00180                         y -= c->getY();
00181                         n = n->firstChild();
00182                 } else {
00183                         n = n->nextSibling();
00184                 }
00185         }
00186 /*      if (!c) {
00187                 if (x < 0) {
00188                         bp.setBefore(owner->firstChild());
00189                 } else {
00190                         bp.setAfter(owner->lastChild());
00191                 }
00192 
00193         }*/
00194         // if the node has childeren, find the nearest child node without
00195         // children
00196 /*      float mindist = 10000;
00197         n = getNearestNode(x + c->getX(), y + c->getY(), c, mindist);
00198         if (n) {
00199                 MMLNode *m = n;
00200                 while (m != c) {
00201                         x -= m->getX();
00202                         y -= m->getY();
00203                         m = m->parentNode();
00204                 }
00205                 c = n;
00206         }*/
00207         // check if the cursor should be placed before, after or in this node
00208         BoundPoint obp = bp;
00209         if (c->isText()) {
00210                 const MMLText *t = static_cast<const MMLText *>(c);
00211                 long offset = t->getOffset(x);
00212                 bp.set(c, offset);
00213         } else if (x >= c->getWidth()/2) {
00214                 bp.setAfter(c);
00215         } else {
00216                 bp.setBefore(c);
00217         }
00218         return bp != obp;
00219 }
00220 bool
00221 MathCursor::moveTo(float x, float y) {
00222         this->x = x;
00223         this->y = y;
00224         bool change = moveTo(x, y, cur);
00225         change |= !collaps || !curmouse;
00226         collapse();
00227         curmouse = true;
00228         return change;
00229 }
00230 bool
00231 MathCursor::selectTo(float x, float y) {
00232         // if this function was called from a collapsed state,
00233         // set the value of sel to that of cur and update cur to the
00234         // position of the mouse
00235         if (collaps) {
00236                 sel = cur;
00237         }
00238         this->x = x;
00239         this->y = y;
00240         bool change = moveTo(x, y, cur);
00241         selmouse = curmouse;
00242         curmouse = true;
00243         if (change) {
00244                 initRange();
00245         }
00246         return change;
00247 }
00248 void
00249 MathCursor::collapse() {
00250         if (!collaps) {
00251                 collaps = true;
00252                 updateSelection();
00253         }
00254 }

00303 void
00304 MathCursor::updateSelection() {
00305         // update the selected state of the nodes
00306         BoundPoint p(owner);
00307         bool sel = false;
00308         while (!p.atEnd()) {
00309 /*              if (p == *start) {
00310                         printf(" <s> ");
00311                 }
00312                 if (p == *end) {
00313                         printf(" <e> ");
00314                 }*/
00315                 if (sel) {
00316                         sel = p != *end;
00317 //                      if (!sel) printf(" * ");
00318                 } else if (!collaps) {
00319                         sel = p == *start;
00320 //                      if (sel) printf(" * ");
00321                 }
00322                 MMLNode *n = p.rightNode();
00323                 if (n) {
00324 //                      printf("%s, ", n->nodeName());
00325                         n->setSelected(sel);
00326                 } else {
00327                         n = p.container();
00328                         if (n->isElement()) {
00329                                 n->setSelected(n->isSelected() && sel);
00330                         } else if (n->isText()) {
00331                                 n->setSelected(n->isSelected() || sel);
00332                         }
00333                 }
00334                 p.moveNext();
00335         }
00336 }
00337 
00338 MMLNode *
00339 MathCursor::getNearestNode(float x, float y, MMLNode *n, float &mindist) const {
00340         if (!n) return n;
00341         MMLNode *m = n->firstChild();
00342         x -= n->getX();
00343         y -= n->getY();
00344         n = 0;
00345         while (m) {
00346                 if (m->firstChild()) {
00347                         MMLNode *nn = getNearestNode(x, y, m, mindist);
00348                         if (nn) n = nn;
00349                 } else {
00350                         float dist = distToNode(x, y, m);
00351                         if (dist < mindist) {
00352                                 n = m;
00353                                 mindist = dist;
00354                         }
00355                 }
00356                 m = m->nextSibling();
00357         }
00358         return n;
00359 }
00360 float
00361 MathCursor::distToNode(float x, float y, MMLNode *n) const {
00362         float nx = n->getX();
00363         float dx;
00364         if (x < nx) {
00365                 dx = nx - x;
00366         } else if (x > nx + n->getWidth()) {
00367                 dx = x - nx - n->getWidth();
00368         } else {
00369                 dx = 0;
00370         }
00371         float ny = n->getY();
00372         float dy;
00373         if (y < ny - n->getAscent()) {
00374                 dy = ny - n->getAscent() - y;
00375         } else if (y > ny + n->getDescent()) {
00376                 dy = y - ny - n->getDescent();
00377         } else {
00378                 dy = 0;
00379         }
00380         return dx*dx + dy*dy;
00381 }
